00020 class CWarningException: public CBaseException
00021 {
00022 protected:
00023     string m_sClassName;
00024     string m_sFuncName;
00025     //string m_sFile;

00030         const string& sClassName    = "[Unspecified class]", 
00031         const string& sFuncName     = "[Unspecified function]", 
00032         const string& sDescription  = "[Unspecified debug information]" 
00033         ): CBaseException( sDescription )
00034     {
00035         m_sClassName = sClassName;
00036         m_sFuncName  = sFuncName;

00038 
00039     virtual ~CWarningException() {}
00040 
00041     string GetInfo()
00042     { 
00043         return m_sClassName + "::" + m_sFuncName + ": " + m_sDescription;
